channel.title: Firebase Release Notes - Flutter
channel.description: Latest updates and release notes for Firebase Flutter.

item.title: Flutter BoM version 1.1.0 - May 28, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • (android): remove unnecessary error type guarding (#12816). (7d4c200a).
  • (General): update Pigeon version to 19 (#12828). (5e76153f).
    • firebase_auth - v4.20.0
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v7.3.0
    • firebase_auth_web - v5.12.0
  • (General): do not set metadata property unless it has a value (#12805). (978a87db).
    • firebase_storage - v11.7.7
    • firebase_storage_web - v3.9.7
  • (General): Split into separate libraries (#12794). (85a517f4).
    • firebase_vertexai - v0.1.1

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.0.0 - June 04, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • Documentation (General): update documentation for clearPersistence (#12843). (35b78f04).
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • cloud_firestore - v5.0.0
    • cloud_firestore_web - v4.0.0
    • cloud_firestore_platform_interface - v6.2.6
  • (android): use only one FlutterLoader instance (#12845). (40966c78).
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • firebase_messaging - v15.0.0
    • firebase_messaging_web - v3.8.8
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • cloud_functions_web - v4.9.7
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • firebase_analytics_web - v0.5.7+8
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • firebase_auth_web - v5.12.1
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • firebase_core_web - v2.17.1
  • (web): fix some casting issue on Web JS Interop (#12852). (4b56df1c).
    • firebase_remote_config_web - v1.6.8

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.1.0 - June 11, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • (macos): add Nonull decorator to PigeonParser to remove warnings when building (#12930). (264b7643).
  • (web): ensure streams are removed on "hot restart" (#12913). (c1a67e54).
    • cloud_firestore - v5.0.1
    • cloud_firestore_web - v4.0.1
  • (app-check, web): fixed broken onTokenChanged and ensured it is properly cleaned up. Streams are also cleaned up on "hot restart" (#12933). (093b5fef).
    • firebase_app_check - v0.3.0+1
    • firebase_app_check_web - v0.1.2+9
  • (ios): fix the parsing of an error that could specifically happen when using MicrosoftProvider (#12920). (3b415e64).
  • (apple): create a credential with idToken, rawNonce & appleFullPersonName (#12356). (17793080).
  • (web): unsubscribe from stream handlers after "hot restart" (#12908). (a76c8866).
    • firebase_auth - v5.1.0
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v7.4.0
    • firebase_auth_web - v5.12.2
  • (firestore, web): ensure streams are removed on "hot restart" (#12913). (c1a67e54).
    • firebase_core_web - v2.17.2
  • (web): clean up stream handlers on "hot restart" (#12915). (e298cb4e).
    • firebase_database_web - v0.2.5+9
  • (web): clean up stream handlers on "hot restart" (#12927). (0ea7099c).
    • firebase_storage_web - v3.9.9
  • (General): add name constructor for function calling schema (#12898). (466884b6).
    • firebase_vertexai - v0.2.2

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.2.0 - June 25, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • (ios): add support for initiateOnDeviceConversionMeasurementWithPhoneNumber and initiateOnDeviceConversionMeasurementWithHashedEmailAddress (#12976). (1e25ec1e).
    • firebase_analytics - v11.1.0
    • firebase_analytics_platform_interface - v4.1.0
    • firebase_analytics_web - v0.5.8
  • (apple): bug with cached AuthCredential, hash key was producing different value (#12957). (ef0077e3).
    • firebase_auth - v5.1.1
  • (auth, windows): fix a crash that could happen when using sendEmailVerification or sendPasswordResetEmail (#12946). (a1008290).
    • firebase_core - v3.1.1
  • (windows): add support for creationTime and updateTime (#12966). (70a3fbc9).
    • firebase_storage - v12.1.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.3.0 - July 09, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • (web): indirect dart:js_interop conditional import to fix dart2js build issue (#12925). (6710e999).
  • (General): do not throw if Firebase.apps called before initialising app (#13045). (86ae6fe5).
    • _flutterfire_internals - v1.3.39
    • firebase_core_web - v2.17.3
  • (windows): support multiple databases (#12998). (f80768a4).
  • (web): ensure exact same streams are not unsubscribed (#13032). (110dfae3).
    • cloud_firestore - v5.1.0
    • cloud_firestore_web - v4.0.3
  • (web): add support for options on Web (#12914). (dd7ce8c2).
    • firebase_analytics - v11.2.0
    • firebase_analytics_platform_interface - v4.2.0
    • firebase_analytics_web - v0.5.9
  • (app-check, web): ensure exact same streams are not unsubscribed (#13035). (93f1517b).
    • firebase_app_check_web - v0.1.2+11
  • Documentation (General): add information about error codes for verifyBeforeUpdateEmail (#13036). (8ef7421d).
  • (General): fixing scopes and parameters that would not work for GoogleAuthProvider (#13018). (a292282d).
  • (web): ensure exact same streams are not unsubscribed (#13033). (111f5f64).
    • firebase_auth - v5.1.2
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v7.4.2
    • firebase_auth_web - v5.12.4
  • (web): ensure exact same streams are not unsubscribed in debug mode (#13029). (f122380d).
    • firebase_database_web - v0.2.5+11
  • (web): ensure exact same streams are not unsubscribed (#13034). (20d00023).
    • firebase_storage_web - v3.9.11

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.4.0 - July 30, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • (web): stop cleaning up snapshot listeners in debug (#13119). (82a63c8b).
  • (General): support for PersistentCacheIndexManager for firestore instances for managing cache indexes. (#13070). (806c15d7).
    • cloud_firestore - v5.2.0
    • cloud_firestore_platform_interface - v6.3.0
    • cloud_firestore_web - v4.1.0
  • (web): Default to empty object for initializeAnalytics (#13083). (8f1346e5).
    • firebase_analytics_web - v0.5.9+1
  • Documentation (General): add information about error codes for email/password functions (#13100). (aeafc356).
    • firebase_auth - v5.1.3
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v7.4.3
  • (General): Add copyWith to FirebaseOptions (#13084). (c7963d63).
    • firebase_core_platform_interface - v5.2.0
  • Documentation (android): update inline documentation on behavior (#12948). (8d7e2217).
    • firebase_messaging - v15.0.4
    • firebase_messaging_platform_interface - v4.5.42

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.4.1 - August 06, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

  • (windows): add log to explain that the Storage Emulator is not available on Windows (#13147). (8d1ea80c).

item.title: Flutter BoM version 2.6.0 - September 03, 2024
item.description:
Changelog

    • firebase_app_installations - v0.3.1+1
  • (web): fix an issue that would remove duplicate streams in Debug mode (#13253). (2546971b).
    • firebase_database_web - v0.2.5+14

    • firebase_remote_config - v5.2.0

    • firebase_storage - v12.3.7

item.description:
Changelog

Changelog

item.title: Flutter BoM version 3.8.0 - February 26, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (fdc): Minor changes to improve score (#17126). (dbe29870).
    • firebase_data_connect - v0.1.3+2
  • (General): Added support for generating images using an Imagen 3 model. (#16976). (cd9d896d). Note: This feature is in Public Preview, which means that the it is not subject to any SLA or deprecation policy and could change in backwards-incompatible ways.
    • firebase_vertexai - v1.4.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 3.9.0 - March 31, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (General): migrate cloud functions Apple implementation to Swift (#17232). (9ebc7bc1).
    • cloud_functions - v5.4.0
  • (appcheck, web): replace deprecated members (#17168). (bb13127a).
    • firebase_app_check_web - v0.2.0+9
  • (app_installations, web): resolve type cast error in getId and getToken for wasm (#17181). (14bd67f3).
    • firebase_app_installations_web - v0.1.6+11
  • (web): fix an issue that could occur when deleting FirebaseApp (#17145). (a2246cd0).
    • firebase_auth_web - v5.14.2
  • (General): update C++ SDK to 12.7.0 (#17238). (b0e5843d).
    • firebase_core - v3.13.0
  • (fdc): Implemented partial errors (#17148). (e97eb0b2).
    • firebase_data_connect - v0.1.4

  • (General): Public Preview: Added support for low-latency bidirectional streaming (including audio) using the Gemini Live API (#16991). (4ab6b4c9).

    Note: This feature is in Public Preview, which means that it is not subject to any SLA or deprecation policy and could change in backwards-incompatible ways.
    • firebase_vertexai - v1.5.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 3.10.0 - April 28, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (General): add missing HarmBlockThreshold to exported APIs (#17249). (59d902c6).
  • BREAKING (General): Live API breaking changes (#17299). (69cd2a64)
    • firebase_vertexai - v1.6.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 3.11.0 - May 20, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • Initial release of the Firebase AI Logic SDK (FirebaseAI). This SDK replaces the previous Vertex AI in Firebase SDK (FirebaseVertexAI) to accommodate the evolving set of supported features and services. The new Firebase AI Logic SDK provides preview support for the Gemini Developer API, including its free tier offering. Using the Firebase AI Logic SDK with the Vertex AI Gemini API is still generally available (GA).

To start using the new SDK, import the firebase_ai package and use the top-level FirebaseAI class. See details in the migration guide.

Existing FirebaseVertexAI users may continue to use import firebase_vertexai and the FirebaseVertexAI top-level class, though these will be removed in a future release. Also, going forward, new features will only be added into the new FirebaseAI module.

  • (apple): prevent EXC_BAD_ACCESS crash in Apple Sign-In completion handler (#17273). (cc7d28ae).
  • Documentation (firebase_auth): Removed duplicates; fixed typos; removed "unnecessary use of a null check" (#16815). (0eb17e13).
    • firebase_auth - v5.5.4
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v7.6.3
  • (General): avoid calling toJson on raw JSON map or null object (#17356). (7bd63691).
    • firebase_data_connect - v0.1.5

item.title: Flutter BoM version 3.14.0 - July 21, 2025
item.description:

  • (auth, macos): add support for publish and addApplicationDelegate on macOS FlutterPluginRegistrar (#17518). (376bb6ea).
    • firebase_analytics - v11.6.0
  • (auth, macos): add support for publish and addApplicationDelegate on macOS FlutterPluginRegistrar (#17518). (376bb6ea).
    • firebase_app_installations - v0.3.3
  • (macos): add support for publish and addApplicationDelegate on macOS FlutterPluginRegistrar (#17518). (376bb6ea).
    • firebase_auth - v5.7.0
  • (General): resolve iOS crash when enabling automatic data collection via setAutomaticDataCollectionEnabled (#17497). (cd8b58d0).
    • firebase_core - v3.15.2
  • (fdc): Fixed readme link (#17504). (6068edf9).
    • firebase_data_connect - v0.1.5+4
  • (General): add support for Pigeon. Update iOS to Swift and Android to Swift (#17489). (08ecc502).
    • firebase_remote_config - v5.5.0
    • firebase_remote_config_platform_interface - v1.6.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 4.0.0 - July 28, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • BREAKING (General): bump iOS SDK to version 12.0.0 (#17549). (b2619e68).
  • BREAKING (General): bump Android SDK to version 34.0.0 (#17554). (a5bdc051).
  • BREAKING (General): bump JS SDK to version 12.0.0 (#17548). (b44c965b).
    • firebase_core - v4.0.0
    • firebase_core_web - v3.0.0
  • BREAKING (General): remove deprecated functions (#17559). (67017fd6)
    • cloud_firestore - v6.0.0
    • cloud_firestore_platform_interface - v7.0.0
    • cloud_firestore_web - v5.0.0
  • (General): validatePassword method/PasswordPolicy Support (#17439). (9a032b34).
  • BREAKING (General): remove deprecated functions. See details and migration guides (#17562). (d50aad95)
    • firebase_auth - v6.0.0
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v8.0.0
    • firebase_auth_web - v6.0.0
  • BREAKING (General): remove deprecated methods for breaking change release (#17560). (ea3034d8)
    • firebase_analytics - v12.0.0
    • firebase_analytics_platform_interface - v5.0.0
    • firebase_analytics_web - v0.6.0
  • BREAKING (General): remove deprecated functions (#17561). (3e4302c4)
    • firebase_app_check - v0.4.0
    • firebase_app_check_platform_interface - v0.2.0
  • (General): remove deprecated functions (#17563). (1b716261).
    • firebase_messaging - v16.0.0
    • firebase_messaging_platform_interface - v4.7.0
    • firebase_messaging_web - v4.0.0
  • (android): make onCancel accept nullable arguments to avoid crash on hot restart (#17569). (2b782558).
    • firebase_remote_config - v6.0.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 4.1.0 - August 11, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (General): Fix usageMetadata.thoughtsTokenCount (#17608). (fe9ddd33).
  • (General): Expose ThinkingConfig class in firebase_ai.dart for use in GenerationConfig (#17599). (b03381a4).
  • (General): make Live API working with developer API (#17503). (467eaa18)
  • (General): add inlineData support to Developer API (#17600). (5199edb7).
  • (General): handle unknown parts when parsing content (#17522). (ac59c249).
    • firebase_ai - v3.1.0
  • (apple): Move FirebaseAuth imports to implementation files (#17607). (0c3ccd37).
  • (General): add signInSecondFactor property to IdTokenResult for MFA support (#17589). (a4db26ea).
    • firebase_auth - v6.0.1
    • firebase_auth_platform_interface - v8.1.0

item.title: Flutter BoM version 4.2.0 - September 01, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (firebaseai): Added token details parsing for Dev API (#17609). (4bab0b30).
  • (firebaseai): remove candidateCount from LiveGenerationConfig since the connection fails silently when it is set (#17647). (537a3c30).
  • (firebaseai): Export UnknownPart (#17655). (a399e0e1).
  • (General): Add GroundingMetadata parsing for Developer API (#17657). (f8ebbaf1).
  • (firebaseai): add thinking feature (#17652). (5faec2c1).
  • (firebaseai): Add support for limited-use tokens with Firebase App Check. These limited-use tokens are required for an upcoming optional feature called replay protection. We recommend enabling the usage of limited-use tokens now so that when replay protection becomes available, you can enable it sooner because more of your users will be on versions of your app that send limited-use tokens. (#17645). (f2a682a9).
  • (firebaseai): imagen editing (#17556). (62811a61).
  • (firebaseai): add responseJsonSchema to GenerationConfig (#17564). (def807a7).
    • firebase_ai - v3.2.0
  • (iOS): correctly parse forceRefresh argument using boolValue (#17627). (8c0802d0).
    • firebase_app_check - v0.4.0+1

item.title: Flutter BoM version 4.3.0 - September 22, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (firebaseai): fix the json parse for toolCallCancellation (#17690). (7c0496d6).
  • (firebaseai): Added support for the code execution tool. Enabling this tool lets the model generate and run Python code to help it perform complex tasks like solving mathematical equations or visualizing data. (#17661). (032a707d).
  • (firebaseai): add imagen safetysetting attributes (#17707). (f7070f04).
    • firebase_ai - v3.3.0
  • (app-check): Debug token support for the activate method (#17723). (3c638264).
    • firebase_app_check - v0.4.1
    • firebase_app_check_platform_interface - v0.2.1
    • firebase_app_check_web - v0.2.1
  • (General): TOTP macOS support (#17513). (41890d62).
    • firebase_auth - v6.1.0

  • Documentation (General): correct androidClientId docs (was incorrectly labeled iOS-only)

  • Clarify as Android OAuth client ID

  • Note it is used on Android only

Fixes firebase/flutterfire#13519 (#17720). (0b6b13d0).

    • firebase_core_platform_interface - v6.0.1
  • (fdc): add support Int64 to nativeFromJson (#17673). (451e7a46).
  • (fdc): issue where if path was empty on web, the app crashed (#17704). (e9a6c045).
  • (app-check): Debug token support for the activate method (#17723). (3c638264).
    • firebase_data_connect - v0.2.1
  • (performance): add support for Pigeon. Update iOS to Swift and Android to Kotlin (#17676). (9c2ab08a).
    • firebase_performance - v0.11.1
    • firebase_performance_platform_interface - v0.1.6

item.title: Flutter BoM version 4.4.0 - October 13, 2025
item.description:
Changelog

  • (General): add validation for PromptFeedback parsing and handle empty cases (#17753). (91baa07b).
  • (General): the package version number wasn't properly updated after migrating from vertex_ai (#17745). (43059b9b).
  • (firebaseai): mark imagen generate function ga (#17757). (a52255e2).
  • (firebaseai): update of bidi input api (#17662). (6d1a0daf).
  • (firebaseai): Add support for URL context (#17736). (f3656634).
    • firebase_ai - v3.4.0
  • (General): Deprecate androidProvider and appleProvider parameters in activate method (#17742). (4e7f800e).
  • (General): Expose AppleAppAttestProvider without importing platform interface (#17740). (6c2355a0).
    • firebase_app_check - v0.4.1+1
    • firebase_app_check_platform_interface - v0.2.1+1
  • (app_check): Deprecate androidProvider and appleProvider parameters in activate method (#17742). (4e7f800e).
    • firebase_data_connect - v0.2.1+1
  • (firebase_messaging): fix null apple notification when sound is of type String (#17770). (7fe893c0).
  • (firebase_messaging): update APNS token error message for clarity (#17763). (08a04332).
    • firebase_messaging - v16.0.3
    • firebase_messaging_platform_interface - v4.7.3
  • (web): add web support for onConfigUpdated (#17750). (799b12e4).
    • firebase_remote_config - v6.1.0
    • firebase_remote_config_web - v1.9.0
